name: Asteroid (ibniss)
description:
A remake of the Atari Asteroid game. Shoot and destroy asteroids and flying saucers - try to survive for as long as you can!

The game was submitted as part of the Introduction to Video Games Programming module at Swansea University https://www.swansea.ac.uk/

Note:

The game was made for the standalone (i.e. Windows) build first and foremost. The WebGL build works decently on fullscreen but for the original experience download the standalone build.
